actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide mandatory social security coverage for Members of Congress, and for the President and Vice President.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends Title II (Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act and the Internal Revenue Code to include Members of Congress, the President, and the Vice President under the Federal Old-Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance system.

titles.title: A bill to provide mandatory social security coverage for Members of Congress, and for the President and Vice President.
